R

remove(Item) - Method in class bork.NPC
Removes the given item from this NPC's inventory.
remove(Item) - Method in class bork.Room
Removes an item from this room.
removeFromInventory(Item) - Method in class bork.GameState
Removes an item from the player's inventory matching the one read in from input
removeItem(String) - Method in class bork.Dungeon
Removes an item from the dungeon's hashtable.
restore(String) - Method in class bork.GameState
Restores the GameState conditions from file
restoreState(Scanner) - Method in class bork.Dungeon
Restore the (changeable) state of this dungeon to that reflected in the reader passed.
restoreState(Scanner, Dungeon) - Method in class bork.Room
Restores the save conditions of each room, including their contents and whether the player has visited the Room.
Room - Class in bork
Constructs new Rooms and holds the methods needed to change or access the properties of any dungeon Room.
Room(String) - Constructor for class bork.Room
A Room constructor that initializes with the Room title.
Room(Scanner, Dungeon) - Constructor for class bork.Room
Constructs a room based off of data in the file attached to the given Scanner.
Room(Scanner, Dungeon, boolean) - Constructor for class bork.Room
Given a Scanner object positioned at the beginning of a "room" file entry, read and return a Room object representing it.
